languages.text: "Я видела, как под твоей рукой расцвел Фолстоун, и в секторе появился новый маяк для праведных душ. Это требует тщания и терпения, которыми я, увы, не обладаю — мне уготован был путь карательницы, а не созидательницы".

"I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."
languages.original_text: "Я видела, как под твоей рукой расцвел Фолстоун, и в секторе появился новый маяк для праведных душ. Это требует тщания и терпения, которыми я, увы, не обладаю — мне уготован был путь карательницы, а не созидательницы".

traits.locale_text: "I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."

"I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."

languages.text: "Ich sah Foulstone unter Eurer Hand aufblühen und zu einem neuen Leitstern für rechtschaffene Seelen im Sektor werden. Ein derartiges Unterfangen erfordert Eifer und Geduld, Qualitäten, an denen es mir leider mangelt ... ich bin mehr Castigatorin als Baumeisterin."
languages.original_text: "I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sah Foulstone unter Eurer Hand aufblühen und zu einem neuen Leitstern für rechtschaffene Seelen im Sektor werden. Ein derartiges Unterfangen erfordert Eifer und Geduld, Qualitäten, an denen es mir leider mangelt ... ich bin mehr Castigatorin als Baumeisterin."

languages.text: « J'ai vu Rochepeste s'épanouir sous votre main, et ce faisant, un nouveau phare s'est allumé dans le secteur pour guider les âmes vertueuses. Une telle entreprise nécessite patience et persévérance, des qualités qui hélas me font défaut... Ma voie à moi est celle du châtiment, et non celle de la création. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu Rochepeste s'épanouir sous votre main, et ce faisant, un nouveau phare s'est allumé dans le secteur pour guider les âmes vertueuses. Une telle entreprise nécessite patience et persévérance, des qualités qui hélas me font défaut... Ma voie à moi est celle du châtiment, et non celle de la création. »

languages.text: 「あなたの手によってファウルストーンが急成長を遂げ、それによって宙域の正義の魂に新たな火が灯されるのを私は見てきた。そのような泥浴には勤勉さと忍耐が必要となるものだが、それは私には欠けているものだ。私の道は建築者ではなく、キャスティゲイターなのでな」
languages.original_text: "I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの手によってファウルストーンが急成長を遂げ、それによって宙域の正義の魂に新たな火が灯されるのを私は見てきた。そのような泥浴には勤勉さと忍耐が必要となるものだが、それは私には欠けているものだ。私の道は建築者ではなく、キャスティゲイターなのでな」

languages.text: «He visto Rocainmunda florecer bajo su gobierno, y, gracias a ello, se encendió un nuevo faro para las almas justas del sector. Una empresa de ese calibre exige diligencia y paciencia: cualidades de las que yo, tristemente, carezco. Mi senda es la del castigo, no la de la construcción».
languages.original_text: "I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."

traits.locale_text: «He visto Rocainmunda florecer bajo su gobierno, y, gracias a ello, se encendió un nuevo faro para las almas justas del sector. Una empresa de ese calibre exige diligencia y paciencia: cualidades de las que yo, tristemente, carezco. Mi senda es la del castigo, no la de la construcción».

languages.text: “我看到荒寂岩地在你的统治下茁壮成长，为所有正义的灵魂点燃了新的灯塔，照亮了这片星区。这样的成就需要相当的勤奋与耐心，遗憾的是，我缺乏这些美德——我更适合踏上惩戒者的道路，而非建设者的道路。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."

traits.locale_text: “我看到荒寂岩地在你的统治下茁壮成长，为所有正义的灵魂点燃了新的灯塔，照亮了这片星区。这样的成就需要相当的勤奋与耐心，遗憾的是，我缺乏这些美德——我更适合踏上惩戒者的道路，而非建设者的道路。”

languages.text: "Menfurtaş'ın ellerinde filizlenişine ve böylece erdemli ruhlar için sektörde yeni bir yuvaya dönüşümüne şahit oldum. Böylesi bir girişim, gayret ve sabır gerektirir. Ne yazık ki bu nitelikler bende mevcut değil. Benim yolum; kurucunun değil, cezacının yoludur."
languages.original_text: "I have seen Foulstone burgeon under your hand, and with that, a new beacon for righteous souls was lit in the sector. Such an endeavour takes diligence and patience, and these qualities I, regrettably, lack — mine is the path of a castigator, not a builder."
